content: or un cid 415 l thumb reaches just past your knuckle tip be sure to count your rounds so you know how many rounds to knit for the 2nd mi cid 425 en bind off in pa cid 425 ern when weaving in ends take the tail from the start of the thumb and s cid 415 tch to close up the two gaps at the base of the thumb weave in all other ends © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits 5 | page
